bio: data @ Dragonfly & public goods contributor on Dune
contributionDescription:
Hello, I have created public good Dune dashboards such as:
- ETH Staking: https://dune.com/hildobby/eth2-staking
- Gas Overview: https://dune.com/hildobby/Gas
- NFT Market Overview: https://dune.com/hildobby/NFTs
- NFT Wash Trading: https://dune.com/hildobby/nfts-wash-trading

I've also created 300+ tables on Dune (most anyone has) for all Dune analysts to use. Some notable ones include: evms.[transactions, traces, logs, ...], nft.[transfers, approvals, trades, wash_trades, info], fungible.transfers, dex.[flashloans, info], staking_ethereum.[entities, deposits, flows, info], addresses_events.first_funded_by, airdrop.claims, tornado_cash.[deposits, withdrawals], ...

contributionLinks.description: Dune's spellbook repo, used to create tables to use on Dune

impactDescription: The dashboards I have created have been used to get a better picture of onchain activity, thus helping with research for everyone involved. The tables I have created on Dune have also been very helpful to many analysts who can now focus more on analytics rather than needing to tackle a lot of data engineering.
